contentrichtext.text: {{distinguish2|[[Independent Party (disambiguation)]]}} '''Independence Party''' can refer to various political parties past and present throughout the world, such as: *[[Independence Party (Catalonia)]] *[[Independence Party (Finland)]] *[[Independence Party (Iceland)]] (Sjálfstæðisflokkurinn) *[[Independence Party (India)]] *[[Independence Party (Morocco)]] *[[Independence Party (Palestine)]] *[[Estonian Independence Party]] *[[Irish Independence Party]] *[[Independence (Israeli political party)]] *[[Puerto Rican Independence Party]] *[[Scottish Independence Party]], United Kingdom *[[Taiwan Independence Party]] *[[United Kingdom Independence Party]] In the United States: *[[United States Independence Party]] (or "Independence League"), formed by William Randolph Hearst in the early 1900s, now defunct *[[Alaskan Independence Party]] *[[Independence Party of America]] *[[Independence Party of Minnesota]] *[[Independence Party of New York]] {{disambig}}
